name: webpack-chrome-extension
description: Bootstrap playground for developing Chrome extensions with all new features like Webpack, Babel, React and almost everything you want.

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir lib --source-maps inline --presets es2015 --plugins transform-object-rest-spread --watch
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir lib --source-maps inline --presets es2015 --plugins transform-object-rest-spread
